attributes.action: Talk with Fife Social Services re. the case of Kelly Robertson and Mark McDougall who had their 3 day old newborn removed from their care. Why can this loving young couple not bring up their own baby WITH SUPPORT from SS?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an ex Family Caseworker I am shocked by the brutality of SS involvment in this couples family life. in 2010 surely SS should be providing love and all needed support to this couple to allow them at least the chance to try to bring up their new born son themselves? Is this not discrimination against mums with a disability? Please everyone who has a shred of horror at how it must feel to have your new born taken from you and then placed with an unknown woman and only allowed to visit for an hour per day, what must this poor mum do for the other 23hrs? This is not Britain as I wish to know it.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
